summary: Build a mobile-friendly task manager app with a good user interface.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal task checklist app icon, flat illustration (app-icon.dim_512x512.png)
- Empty state illustration showing an empty task list on a phone screen, clean modern style (empty-state-tasks.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a mobile-first task manager UI that works well on phone screens, including an accessible layout with a bottom navigation (or equivalent compact navigation) and touch-friendly controls.
Implement core task CRUD features: create tasks, view task list, view task details, edit tasks, and delete tasks.
Add task organization and productivity controls: task completion toggle, basic filtering (All / Active / Completed), and sorting (e.g., newest first, or by due date if present).
Provide a polished, coherent visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a modern mobile task manager, and apply it consistently across all screens.
Generate and include custom static images used by the UI (stored under frontend/public/assets/generated) and render them in the app where appropriate (e.g., app icon, empty state).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a task manager app that works well on phones with a good user interface.
Persist tasks in the Motoko backend so that tasks remain available after page refresh and canister upgrade safe handling is considered (use stable storage patterns as needed).
